=Overview=

=Installation=

1. *Download the desired build from the [http://code.google.com/p/rapid-tools/downloads/list dowload page].* Use a featured build if you are unsure, using a daily build may add more features at the cost of stability.

2. *Extract the zip file to a temporary folder on your SharePoint server.*

3. *Locate the server folder, and the RapidTools-Server-Install.cmd file.*

5. *Run RapidTools-Client-Install.cmd.* You should see the Rapid.Tools.wsp file being added and deployed to your SharePoint farm.

*Note:* To reference framework components inside a Visual Studio project you will need to copy the Rapid.Tools.dll assembly to your project and create a file reference by browsing to the assembly.

=Providers=
